add.title: The following repository aliases have been enabled on this guild / server:

remove.no_remove: No repository aliases have been removed.

list.no_current: This guild / server does not have any repository aliases at this time.
list.title: The following repository aliases are enabled on this guild / server:

execute.invalid_issue: Please provide a valid issue number.
